bilingual.source: His poor health was disadvantage to him.
bilingual.target: 他身体不好是他的不利条件。

bilingual.source: One at a disadvantage and expected to lose.
bilingual.target: 处于不利条件并预期失败的人。

bilingual.source: The other candidate's main disadvantage is her age.
bilingual.target: 另一候选人的主要不利条件是她的年龄问题。

bilingual.source: Here accent will be very much to her disadvantage if the wants to be an actress.
bilingual.target: 她要是想当演员，她的口音是个很大的不利条件。

bilingual.source: There are methods to bypass this disadvantage but with traditional two-decked attenuators the input impedance will vary with the volume setting.
bilingual.target: 有在支路的方法这不利条件但是有输入阻抗将随卷而变化确定的传统两装饰衰减器。

bilingual.source: Any disadvantage during construction may potentially affect the internal forces and deck alignments after it is open to traffic .
bilingual.target: 大型斜拉桥施工过程复杂、控制要求严格，施工期各种不利条件均可能对成桥内力、线型造成潜在的影响。

bilingual.source: The disadvantage of this plan is the high cost.
bilingual.target: 这个计划的坏处是成本太高。

bilingual.source: Being overconfident can sometimes be a disadvantage.
bilingual.target: 过于自信有时会成为一种劣势。

bilingual.source: Eating too many sweets has a disadvantage for health.
bilingual.target: 吃太多甜食对健康有坏处。

yingyinNormal.en: I confess I feel I have you at somewhat of a disadvantage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你得承认我很准确的抓住了你的弱点。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you're starting at a disadvantage. Most of these people have been friends for years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看吧，你会输在起跑线上，这些人大多数都是老朋友了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh! That hardly seems fair. But I guess any team that I'm not on has a decided disadvantage.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这会不会不太公平，我加入任何一队都是对其他队伍的不公平。

yingyinNormal.en: Are you suggesting that your daughter is at a disadvantage because she's being raised by gay parents?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的意思是你们女儿处于不利，因为她是被同志家庭养大的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: My one hope today is that I can be a source of some inspiration. I'm going to address my remarks to anybody, who's ever felt inferior or felt disadvantage, felt screwed by life, this is a speech for the quad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天我唯一的希望就是自己可以成为灵感的源泉，我要对那些感到自卑与失落的人以及那些感觉生活不顺的人发表一下我的看法，这些话只在这里说哦。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不利条件; 缺点; 使处于不利地位

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: an unfavorable circumstance or condition that reduces the chances of success or effectiveness
sense_info_list.zh: 不利条件; 缺点; 使处于不利地位

examination_example.sentence: Competition law as presently interpreted deals with financial <highlight>disadvantage</highlight> to consumers and this is not obvious when the users of these services don't pay for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 竞争法按现行解释，应对的是消费者的经济损失问题，而当这些服务的用户不为服务付费时，法规就不明确了。

examination_example.sentence: Facebook and Google, the two virtual giants, dominate digital advertising to the <highlight>disadvantage</highlight> of all other media and entertainment companies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 脸书和谷歌这两个虚拟巨头主宰着数字广告，对所有其他媒体和娱乐公司不利。
他们在经济上处于不利地位。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 处于劣势；处于不利地位

sense_info_list.en: an unfavorable circumstance or condition that reduces the chances of success or effectiveness
sense_info_list.zh: 不利条件; 缺点; 使处于不利地位

examination_example.sentence: The least we should expect is that they do not foster divisions and exclude those who are already <highlight>disadvantaged</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们至少应该期望的是，它们不会促进分歧，也不会排斥那些已经处于不利地位的人。

examination_example.sentence: They give the <highlight>disadvantaged</highlight> students a chance to see the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们给了弱势学生一个看世界的机会。

examination_example.sentence: They widen the gap between privileged and <highlight>disadvantaged</highlight> students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们扩大了特权学生和弱势学生之间的差距。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了帮助弱势群体，Holker再次开放了花园。
